title: Microsoft | SDE1 (L60) |  Bangalore, India
content:
Received offer from Microsoft for L60

* Education: B.E Computer Science & Engineering, Private Tier-1/2
* Years of Experience: 8 months as FTE, 6 months as Intern at the same company
* Prior Experience: SDE1 at Top FinTech MNC
* Previous CTC: Rs. ~42.3L (19.5L (salary) + 3.5L (joining) + $21,000 (RSU - 3.5 years) + 1.95L (Perf bonus))
* Date of the Offer: April 2024
* Company: Microsoft
* Title/Level: L60
* Location: Bangalore, India
* Salary: Rs. 23,00,000/-
* Joining Bonus: Rs. 4L (2.5L at joining + 1.5L at 1st anniversary)
* Stock bonus: $65,000 (4 years)
* Performance Bonus: Upto 20% performnce
* Relocation Bonus: NA (I'm in the same city)
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 
	* 1st year: 23L (salary) + 2.5L(joining) + 13.75L(stocks) = 39.25L
	* 2nd year: 23L (salary) + 1.5 (joining) + 13.75L (stocks) + 2.3-4.6L (performance 10-20%) = 40.55-42.85L
* Benefits: Standard Microsoft India benefits
* Other details: Looking for a switch in another MNC, because given a completely different team at the time of FTE which has legacy code base and outdated tech. Recruiter agreed to give me Joining Bonus becuase I had to settle the relocation amount from previous company.
yoe: 8 Months As Fte, 6 Months As Intern At The Same Company

title: Nvidia IC3
content:
Education: Tier 1 Btech
Years of Experience: 6.5 YOE
Current : 28L Base + 3L bonus + 7L stocks= 38LPA

Date of the Offer: March 2024
Company: Nvidia
Title/Level: IC3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: Base 40.5 LPA
Signing Bonus: 7L
Stock bonus: 90L (Over 4 years ) - 22.5L per year
Bonus: - No
Relocation - 2L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 72L(1st year), (63L 2nd year)
Benefits: Nvidia India perks
Competing offer: Microsoft (similar base, and stock, but there is yearly bonus in MS which is not there in Nvidia) https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5049204/Microsoft-L62

Which is a better offer, in terms of company and furture prospects?

title: Microsoft L62
content:
Education: Tier 1 Btech
Years of Experience: 6.5 YOE
Current : 28L Base + 3L bonus + 7L stocks= 38LPA

Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L62
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Base 41 LPA
	Signing Bonus: 10L + 4L (after 1 year)
Stock bonus: 110K USD (Over 4 years ) - 23.1L per year
Bonus: 0-20 % =4.1L (taking 10% avg) 
Relocation - 4.6L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  82L(1st year), (72L 2nd year)
Benefits: microsoft India perks
Competing offer: Nvidia (similar base, and stock) https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5049378/Nvidia-IC3

Is this a good offer for ~7 YOE?

Accident Insurance - INR 48,00,000 (3x of Base)
Life Insurance - INR 32,00,000 (2x of Base)
Leaves - 12 (Earned) + 6 (Casual) + 6 (Sick) + 3 (Other)

Previous compensation -

Company: Wissen Technology
Title/Level: Asoociate Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base: INR 14,00,000
Joining Bonus: INR 1,00,000
Relocation Bonus: INR 30,000

Providing this compensation to encourage others to share promotion compensation and also regular compensation in detail to increase awareness in such scenarios. Hope it helps.
